sentences.en: Did the engineer estimate for building the bridge?
sentences.cn: 那位工程师估计建桥的费用了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He trained as a civil engineer (= one who designs and builds roads, bridges etc ).
sentences.cn: 他接受过土木工程师培训。

sentences.en: He was trained there as a mining engineer.
sentences.cn: 他在那里被培养成一名采矿工程师.

sentences.en: The engineer and his son held frequent consultations concerning technical problems.
sentences.cn: 工程师和他的儿子经常就技术问题互相征求意见。

sentences.en: The engineer drew a diagram of the bridge.
sentences.cn: 工程师绘制了一幅这座桥的示意图.

sentences.en: The engineer explained the main points of the technical problem over again.
sentences.cn: 工程师把那个技术问题的重点重新讲了一遍.

sentences.en: The engineer has many technical innovations to his credit.
sentences.cn: 这位工程师有许多项技术革新的成就.

sentences.en: The engineer made a complete diagnosis of the bridge's collapse.
sentences.cn: 工程师对桥的倒塌做一次彻底的调查分析.

sentences.en: The engineer was an eager participant in technical co - operation.
sentences.cn: 那位工程师热心参与技术合作.

sentences.en: The most junior executive officer outranked the senior engineer officer aboard ship.
sentences.cn: 在舰船上，级别最低的副舰长也位列级别最高的轮机官之上。

sentences.en: The product is still only a gleam in an engineer's eye.
sentences.cn: 该产品还只是工程师头脑中尚未成形的想法。

sentences.en: The RAF recognized him as an out-standingly able engineer.
sentences.cn: 英国皇家空军表彰他是一名非常能干的机械师。

sentences.en: The spy's cover was that she was a consultant engineer.
sentences.cn: 那女间谍伪装成顾问工程师.

sentences.en: The untimely death of the engineer delayed the completion of the project.
sentences.cn: 工程师的过早去世推迟了工程的完工期.

sentences.en: They attributed the success of their invention to Engineer Huang.
sentences.cn: 他们把发明的成功归于黄工程师.

sentences.en: They're sending an engineer to fix the phone.
sentences.cn: 他们要派一名技师来安装电话。

words.tran_cn: 引擎，发动机；机车，火车头；工具

phrases.tran_cn: 总工程师；[船]轮机长；主任工程师；总技师
电脑工程师；计算机工程师
开发工程师；发展研究工程师
电气工程师，电机工程师
工艺工程师；程序工程师；过程工程师
计划工程师，项目工程师
反向工程，还原工程；逆向工程

trans.tran_cn: 工程师，机械修理工，轮机手，工兵
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to design or build roads, bridges, machines etc

trans.tran_cn: 密谋策划，设计制造，安排，改变基因
trans.tran_en: to make something happen by skilful secret planning
